title: Ticket #6843: Allow starter to forward its job to a remote resource for execution
description:
We want to add some hooks in the starter that allow it to forward its job to a remote agent, who will do the actual execution of the job.

This work is part of a collaboration with CMS researchers at PIC to run jobs located at CERN on the Mare Nostrum system at Barcelona Supercomputing Center (BSC), which has very restricted networking. More information available at RunCmsJobsAtBsc.
